item.title: FT Most Read: Saturday, September 7, 2024 at 7:10 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Ukraine’s Kursk offensive has triggered doubts among Russian elite, spy chiefs say
2. Porn streamer OnlyFans paid owner $630mn in dividends
3. Rachel Reeves faces Whitehall revolt over spending cuts
4. Meloni loses cabinet minister in scandal over mistress
5. Apple’s new iPhone will use Arm’s next-generation chip technology for AI
item.guid: FT Most Read: Saturday, September 7, 2024 at 7:10 PM UTC
